General.Name: GreenPower Motor Company Inc
General.Description: GreenPower Motor Company Inc. designs, manufactures, and distributes electric vehicles for commercial markets in the United States and Canada. The company offers commercial vehicles for delivery, public transit, schools, vanpools, micro-transit, shuttles, and other; and passenger, student, and cargo transportation. It leases its vehicles to customers. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 209 Carrall Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 2J2
